author: Paul Rosta
title: Insights from CRE’s New CFOs
text:
September 24, 2015 Insights from CRE’s New CFOs 
A wave of CFOs have stepped into positions in real estate companies in the past year. All seasoned professionals, some have risen steadily through their company’s ranks, while others served in executive positions elsewhere. Here, they share their thoughts on the pressing real estate issues that give them reason for optimism or cause for concern. For more of their insights, be sure to read “ Minding the Store ” in the September issue of CPE .
